name: Firefox
summary: Firefox is a first-person shooter game based on the 1982 film (itself based on the 1977 novel), which plot revolves around an American pilot trying to steal the latest Soviet stealth fighter jet prototype, titular MiG-31 "Firefox" (fictional - not to be confused with real "Foxhound" interceptor), during the late stage of the Cold War.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1984年1月
  • 程序: Mike Hally, Moe Shore
